localize.text: Do you remember when we still knew the warmth of the sun?
We have become too cold to cherish such thing.
No, the warmth wasn’t meant for us from the start.
You felt it, too. Don’t you?
I can see you longing something since the moment you stepped into this room.
There’s a tale about the two doors.
The doors that never wanted to be opened but had to.
It’s me. Are you there?
Can I come in?
I didn’t want to hear.
I wanted to pretend I was not in the room.
I knew what she was going to say.
Sometimes she could get extremely reckless.
It frightened me whenever she did that.
Open the door
I saw her eyes right after opening the doors.
Her eyes were soaked with red as she had to endure cruel reality.
She walked into your laboratory and started illustrating her hypothesis. Carefully, yet decidedly.
You wanted to say that it’s preposterous, but like always, you were persuaded.
You didn’t want to admit that there’s only one way.
What made us so upset,
is how she put it calmly as if it’s not our business,
and how we had to just tolerate it.
We can’t proceed any further than this.
But we will manage.
We have Carmen, after all!
It will all work out.
Biological scan says Carmen is the fittest of all candidates… We haven’t run a precision test so if we want to find another candidate we can…
Carmen can…
Carmen is….
If it’s Carmen…
Carmen…
You should've been the one to die...
The research was not bearing any fruit, people’s eyes glittering with expectation…
She was on the edge. One more step would make her fall.
But one day, she saw Enoch stopped breathing.
The path was always in the sight.
One glance below the fall,
and she won’t lift her head again.
There’s no answer no matter how many times she called.
Only the sound of water flowing fills the air…
I was just pulling the doorknob like as if I’m insane,
but I hoped it will never open.
I hoped countless times…
Open the door
I saw a pair of closed eyes after I opened the doors.
My eyes were filled with red as I realized that those eyes will never be opened.
I stepped into the bath myself.
So not a fragment of needless emotion such as guilt piles up.
We saw.
She was alive, although bleeding and unconscious.
But we violated her body with our own hands and buried her underneath the ground.
Why was she so cruel, and why were we so cruel?
We asked this answerless question to the toast that celebrates the success bloomed with death.
However,
I found a way to redeem myself…
You have come to the right place.
This is the room where she is sleeping.
Don’t worry, she won’t wake up with this much noise.
Can you meet her again?
Let’s do this.
Ask her, who was watching you from the beginning.
I have something to confess. I actually have a weaker heart than everyone thinks.
I always say things like ‘Count on me’, ‘Just follow me’ in front of people,
but I was never sure about things I do.
If anyone is harmed or put in trouble because of what I do,
I will definitely hate myself. I know it.
That’s why I need to ask you a favor.
No matter what I become, please finish what I started.
We humans have weak heart. One crack on it and it will easily crumble. I am not different. But,
You are not like me, are you?
No matter how cruel this world gets,
you will endure it.
The only way never changes.
You know what I mean, don’t you?
Are you not sure?
I have this routine when I fear the path I took.
It’s like, photosynthesis of plants.
Don’t be so tense, just close your eyes... Yes, just like that.
Make yourself as comfortable as possible, so that your mind is comfortable too.
It tickles, no? But just wait.
and….
Fade away….
Yes, I was the only one.
I was the only one who would fulfill her ideal,
I was the only one who could finish it.
Only me…
But she didn’t tell me that this path is riddled with thorns and spikes.
This is the bucket created from Carmen’s sacrifice.
The bucket is the start, and the destination of this place.
Cogito is endlessly produced here, spewing life and death.
When we saw the bath was overflowing, we thought everything’s over.
However.
We couldn’t be more wrong than that.
She is alive, “like this”.
She saw every path we walked.
Her ideal was too grand. Our miniscule power could not fulfill it.
She sacrificed her everything, but I…
You and I remember what we have done to become a wing, and to stay in the wing.
It was revolting at first.
But how did we change after first few times?
We flawlessly finished those hideous missions just like other wings.
They even evolved their own unique cruelty that can’t be found in other wings.
The story about sacrificing humans to fulfill our ideal needed to be continued.
So, we had to look like we’re maniacs about energy production.
But we all know this.
Were we really only pretending when we were reluctant about countless deaths?
Scrambling through the brain of a living person to join the world, evading the head and the eye,
Throwing a person to a monster just to gain energy,
Reincarnate a man just to live through his agony again…
Do you think they’re something that a normal person would do?
But we closed our eyes and ears. We eventually ended up feeling nothing about what we do.
I named myself Abram to remember these sins, sacrificing innocents.
What did I expect to achieve doing this…? I don’t even know anymore.
It doesn’t matter anymore.
It just doesn’t.
We were wrong from the start.
What’s left for you and I is atonement.
You already knew.
We did not meaninglessly embrace this pain.
Tiphereth knew this long time ago.
That’s why he was always walked ahead of me.
One day, I realized that you and Tipheret were looking at the same place.
I just didn’t want to admit that I am behind. I think that’s why I was always angry.
I am a Sephira of the middle department. I can’t be fallen behind, can I?
That’s the reason why I told you to have some expectation.
We must show them someday.
Show them how valuable our result is.
Expectation of the Meaning of Existence
You will fall onto the ground no matter how much expectation you have.
Photosynthesis was for plants after all.
It was not for someone like you and me.
Don’t you know already? We drove Carmen to death.
I was always furious without a clear reason.
It always felt like I’m missing something. But I didn’t know what that ‘something’ is.
This frustration was expressed in rather bad way, as you saw.
This madness without purpose never went away.
If you didn’t stop me, it would have devoured me.
Look, we can’t go back to the start.
The situation has changed too much.
But I was able to keep my promise with her because you stopped me.
You need to remember now.
She would want you to protect what’s left rather than suffer in guilt.
Courage to Defend
Yes, she entrusted me what’s left.
But we were not the people who Carmen thought we are.
The only person that believed in us was gone.
There was nobody left.
Manager, do you know why I chose this small company among all the other wings?
Of course, Carmen’s moving speech played some part.
But the decisive factor was
because I liked how everyone here trusted Carmen.
You know how meaningless the word “trust” is nowadays, don’t you?
…even more so,
Carmen trusted you to the moment of death,
so did everyone who left.
Why do you think I was able to survive until the end?
Look around you.
Everyone came just for you. And they’re waiting.
Someone Faithful and Trustworthy
How are you so sure?
Carmen is here, not living nor dead.
How can you walk towards the unpredictable future, leaving her here?
We are obliged to be trapped in this cycle of eternity.
But you want to reach tomorrow? You want to escape this regret and atonement?
There is the final door past here that didn’t appear in the story.
I can’t open it.
It only opens to those who are not soaked in regret.
Do you think you can open it?
Open the door
Why is it only darkness that I am seeing?
Why can’t my voice reach you in the end?
...... Yeah, I figured that you can’t give me the answer.
You finally accepted
that we are failures.
But look.
Even though we’re failures, we managed to achieve one thing.
We can see
Carmen again like this.
Although we can’t have a nap on the field under the warm sun like we did in the past,
She’s alive, watching us.
She will understand.
She will tell you that you couldn’t make it to the end, but you did a good job reaching here, that you will have eternal rest with her.
We should have listened to Benjamin in the first place.
My biggest regret and sin is that I did not stop when I should.
Carmen is our sun. It doesn’t matter if we’re underground forever.
Attention, all employees. We congratulate your honorable retirement. This broadcast is pre-recorded.
Let us sink, Carmen.
You can’t hear my voice,
but I don’t care.
I will not open a door anymore...
I wish I’m with you when I open my eyes again someday.
We thank you for your hard work and show respect to your efforts and loyalty….
Close the door
…..Good night.
